backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling public inquiry submissions, admin retrieval of inquiries, and user profile management with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented site features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme configuration.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all marketing site sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable layout component providing consistent spacing and optional muted variant styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with company info, quick links, services list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing the company mission, vision, and service area.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: A contact form component with validation and submission via useSubmitInquiry, displaying contact info and handling form state and errors.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeHer: Hero section with background image, marketing text, key points, and CTA buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Displays a grid of project cards sourced from marketingContent, showing titles, types, locations, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a services grid using icons and descriptions from marketingContent, mapping icon names to Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows differentiators from marketingContent in a grid with mapped icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Exports structured marketing data for services, differentiators, and projects used across UI sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and authentication handling, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits inquiries through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and sets global typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates inquiry form fields for required values and format, returning error messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, assets, and pending feature requests for the VRShivaji Construction site.
